lines: 1. Adwaro manyo rombe mobayo,Mondo gibi ir Yesu Jakwath;Anyisgi weche kaka owacho,"Biuru ira, aherou."
Abiro dhiyo(koro) mondo amanygi,Rombe molalma nobayo (chutho),Mondo gidonje kund (Yesu) Jawarwa;Yesu Nyaromboma notho ni wan (mothonwa).
2. Adwaro manyo rombe mobayo,Mondo anyisgi Yesu Jawar;Mondo akelgi, duto giyudiNgima mochwere mosingonwa.
3. Mano e tich ma adwaro timo,tinde awinjo koluongae;Mondo ating` rombe mosepodho,akelgi ir Jakwadha Maber.
